titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of April 10, 2023, as "Venture Smith Freedom Day".
Expressing support for the designation of April 10, 2023, as "Venture Smith Freedom Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Venture Smith Freedom Day to recognize the 258th anniversary of Venture Smith purchasing his freedom from slavery.
